Articles.Content:
Hi there,

before 1.0 you could go to docking menu and switch between rotational and translational movement of RCS. The switch was happening by pressing space, you were unable to run your main engine ect. Now engine controls (shift) work as in normal flight and space IN ADDITION to change rot/trans separate next stage. yay... so how should I put my rcs in translation mode?

av.

Edited April 30, 2015 by Avantar
Stay in staging mode and use IJKLHN for translation. You may want to hit alt+L to lock your staging and shut down your main engine, just in case.

Thank you Taki and Trance. I figured out that I'd rather remap the keys back to original rotate/translate docking mode :-)

Avantar
